name: Pseudoanima DEMO
description:
NOTES:

  • This game requires PowerPoint 2016, PowerPoint 2019, or Office 365
  • This game is not suitable for kids or for those easily disturbed.

A mysterious death, a creepy pasta, and you - Dwight Ewing, who is too curious for his own good. How thin is the boundary between real life and fantasy?

This game is based on the nature of choice. Your decisions will heavily impact the telling of the story.

Inspired by The Magnus Archives - “Binary”, dive into the world of code, dendrites and axons.

This game is a demo. It contains the prologue and the first chapter. Future chapters will be added soon

Created by:

  •  Kyle Elgarico
  •  Yuri Masigla
  • Darica Marcelino
  • Isaac Balois

Installing:

After downloading the ppsm, go to the file's properties and check the "Unblock" checkbox under General. Afterwards, when you open the file, there will be a pop-up. Click "Enable content for this session" and then click OK.

This game requires PowerPoint 2016, PowerPoint 2019, or Office 365.
